intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) provides comprehensive technical guidance for service providers involved in generating standardised land use and land cover (LU/LC) maps within the Copernicus Urban Atlas programme. It focuses on the Urban Atlas product, covering mapping specifications, nomenclature, and quality control procedures essential for creating congruent and comparable datasets across Functional Urban Areas (FUAs) in Europe and neighbouring countries for the reference years 2012 and 2018. The manual also includes detailed specifications for additional information layers such as the Street Tree Layer (STL) and Digital Height Model (DHM).
